Author: GitHub
Title: Open Source Friday Special with Flox
Description: At GitHub Universe, Andrea talks with Ron Efroni (Flox/NixOS Foundation) and Rob Ferguson (Former Microsoft for Startups) about environment hell, why containers don’t fully solve reproducibility, and how Flox builds on Nix for portable, secure, deterministic environments—plus Series B plans, Kubernetes support, CUDA distribution, and the Microsoft for Startups program.
